channel.title: Deadman Mode v1.0 - In this world you will die! (2006 Content)
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.deadmanps.com/assets/img/logo.png[/img] Website: http://www.deadmanps.com/ Client: http://deadmanps.com/Play/Client.jar
- Safety deposit box where players can store upto 8 items. (Use items on Deposit Box at a bank.) - Kill players for upto 5 bank keys!:3: - Hunt skulled players and take their keys! - Lock two CB skills and three non-cb skills! - Players lose 50% exp on death against players! - 40x Runescape EXP rate - 474 Hotkey system for smoother PKing! - Tonnes of google content available, and more to be decided by you! - Discover unique escape routes relying on skills such as agility and thieving, or items like keys to evade danger! If you are skulled and killed by a NPC you will drop 20 items from your bank for everyone to see and lose 50% exp, if you aren't skulled you will lose 33% of your EXP but no items from your bank. If you are skulled and killed by a player, you will give the killer a key to raid 20 items from your bank and lose 50% exp. If you are unskulled and killed by a player you'll still lose 50% but only 10 items from your bank. You may attack skulled players without fear of being skulled!
Media: [img]http://i.imgur.com/bLQasaV.png[/img] [img]http://i63.tinypic.com/eq8ccn.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/LaZxeGl.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/x4Qv7mO.png[/img] . Guarded and multi zones [spoiler][img]http://cdn.runescape.com/assets/img/external/oldschool/2015/deadman/safe-zones-new.jpg[/img][/spoiler] [size=18pt]Skill locking: Currently the skill locking system is under development, you will have to use a command to lock and unlock skills. (::protect and ::unprotect) You may have a total of 2 cb skills and 3 non cb skills.[/size]
Attack = 0 Defence = 1 Strength = 2 HP = 3 Range = 4 Prayer = 5 Magic = 6 Cooking = 7 Woodcutting = 8 Fletching = 9 Fishing = 10 Firemaking = 11 Crafting = 12 Smithing = 13 Mining = 14 Herblore = 15 Agility = 16 Thieving = 17 Slayer = 18 Farming = 19 Runecrafting = 20

item.title: Deadman Mode v1.0 - In this world you will die! (2006 Content)
item.dc:creator: @Pk_Range502 Pk Range502
item.description:
@Pk_Range502 wrote:

[center]

Website: http://www.deadmanps.com/
Client: http://deadmanps.com/Play/Client.jar

- Safety deposit box where players can store upto 8 items. (Use items on Deposit Box at a bank.) - Kill players for upto 5 bank keys!:3: - Hunt skulled players and take their keys! - Lock two CB skills and three non-cb skills! - Players lose 50% exp on death against players! - 40x Runescape EXP rate - 474 Hotkey system for smoother PKing! - Tonnes of google content available, and more to be decided by you! - Discover unique escape routes relying on skills such as agility and thieving, or items like keys to evade danger!

If you are skulled and killed by a NPC you will drop 20 items from your bank for everyone to see and lose 50% exp, if you aren’t skulled you will lose 33% of your EXP but no items from your bank.
If you are skulled and killed by a player, you will give the killer a key to raid 20 items from your bank and lose 50% exp. If you are unskulled and killed by a player you’ll still lose 50% but only 10 items from your bank.

You may attack skulled players without fear of being skulled!

Media:

bLQasaV.png762×501

eq8ccn.png774×532

LaZxeGl.png764×502

x4Qv7mO.png765×499

.
Guarded and multi zones
[spoiler][/spoiler]

[size=18pt]Skill locking:
Currently the skill locking system is under development, you will have to use a command to lock and unlock skills. (::protect and ::unprotect) You may have a total of 2 cb skills and 3 non
cb skills.[/size]

Attack = 0 Defence = 1 Strength = 2 HP = 3 Range = 4 Prayer = 5 Magic = 6 Cooking = 7 Woodcutting = 8 Fletching = 9 Fishing = 10 Firemaking = 11 Crafting = 12 Smithing = 13 Mining = 14 Herblore = 15 Agility = 16 Thieving = 17 Slayer = 18 Farming = 19 Runecrafting = 20
